required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dilapan-S/Dilasoft E-Registry in Induction of Labor
clinical_study.official_title: International Observational E-Registry on the Use of Dilapan-S / Dilasoft Osmotic Dilators for Cervical Ripening Prior to Labour Induction

brief_summary.textblock: International Observational E-Registry on the use of DILAPAN-S® osmotic dilator / DILASOFT® osmotic dilator for cervical ripening prior to labour induction.

detailed_description.textblock: International Observational E-Registry to monitor current common clinical practice of use of Dilapan-S / Dilasoft for cervical ripening and following procedures of labour induction with the main focus on the duration of induced labor procedure .

primary_outcome.time_frame: max. up to 24 hrs; estimated average 12 hrs)

primary_outcome.description: Overall duration of induced labor procedure

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of vaginal deliveries within 24 hours
primary_outcome.description: Rate of vaginal deliveries achieved within 24 hours from the beginning of induced labor procedure

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of osmotic dilator used: Dilapan-S or Dilasoft
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hrs; estimated average 12 hrs
up to 24 hrs; estimated average 12 hrs

secondary_outcome.measure: Bishop Score increase after extraction of osmotic dilators
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hrs; estimated average 12 hrs
up to 24 hrs; estimated average 12 hrs
secondary_outcome.description: uterine contractions, uterine hypersensitivity, effect on the foetus

secondary_outcome.measure: Agents / procedures used for induction of labour, if any
% of spontaneous vaginal deliveries following immediately after pre-induction

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 5 and 10 minutes after delivery (estimated maximum up to 72 hrs)
secondary_outcome.description: Apgar score at 0, 5 and 10 minutes after delivery, venous and arterial cord pH and base excess measurements

secondary_outcome.measure: Maternal infectious complication and its relation to the use of Dilapan-S/Dilasoft
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hrs; Complications, if any, will be followed-up until stable situation has been reached.
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical signs of maternal infection found at patient´s examination are defined as follows: Body temperature > 37.8°C Increased pain Other overt clinical signs of infection e.g. vaginal discharge Laboratory test results that need to be correlated with clinical signs of infection: CRP levels > 8 mg/l Leukocyte count > 18 x 109/l Positive microbiological testing

secondary_outcome.measure: Neonatal infectious complication and its relation to the use of Dilapan-S/Dilasoft
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hrs; Complications, if any, will be followed-up until stable situation has been reached.
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical signs of neonatal infection found at patient´s examination are defined as follows: Body temperature > 37.8°C Increased pain Other overt clinical signs of infection e.g. vaginal discharge Laboratory test results that need to be correlated with clinical signs of infection: CRP levels > 8 mg/l Leukocyte count > 18 x 109/l Positive microbiological testing

clinical_study.condition: Labor; Forced or Induced, Affecting Fetus or Newborn

intervention.description: Synthetic osmotic dilators Dilapan-S, Dilasoft for cervical ripening prior to induction of labor in women with unfavourable cervix

study_pop.textblock: All the patients in whom the use of osmotic dilators Dilapan-S or Dilasoft is indicated by the Investigator after a thorough Medical examination will be included in the study unless that the patient disagree.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Indication for induction of labor
- Unfavourable cervix
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of overt genital tract infection
